docs.snippet: Headed by Dr. Baltazar Brum, Foreign Minister, the visiting Uruguayan Mission received an enthusiastic welcome on its arrival in this city yesterday. At the City Hall the members of the mission were officially welcomed by Mayor Hylan, and accorded...
docs.lead_paragraph: Headed by Dr. Baltazar Brum, Foreign Minister, the visiting Uruguayan Mission received an enthusiastic welcome on its arrival in this city yesterday. At the City Hall the members of the mission were officially welcomed by Mayor Hylan, and accorded the freedom of the city.

docs.lead_paragraph: Seven or eight years ago GEORGES CLEMENCEAU, after his South American travels, described the Uruguayans as "impulsive idealists." In that respect they are closely akin to their brethren of North America. We have had notable proofs in 1917 and 1918 of that idealism of theirs, though, like...
